trans-unit.target: You already have an active friend request at Kompisbyrån.
In Kompisbyrån we practise Swedish over a "fika".

We create meetings between new friends with similar interests. We create contact between those who are new in Sweden and those who have lived in Sweden for a long time. You can sign up as a Fika friend (Fikakompis) or Music friend (Musikkompis).

As a Fika friend we will match you with a person with similar interests that you have. You meet over a ”fika” and practice Swedish! Together we can increase the spirit of community in the everyday life. Sign up as a Fika friend today!
Share your music interest with new friends from various cultures.

We believe that music unites. That’s why we now start Musikkompis together with the mobile company 3. With Musikkompis, we give people a chance to meet through music. Play instruments together, go to concerts or talk music over a cup of coffee.
To meet new friends, you need to enter your e-mail and a password of your choice.
Share your music interest with new friends from various cultures.

We believe that music unites. That’s why we now start Musikkompis together with the mobile company 3 . With Musikkompis, we give people a chance to meet through music. Play instruments together, go to concerts or talk music over a cup of coffee. It doesn't matter if you are a professional or an amateur - we want to make it easier for all people who likes music, to meet other music enthusiasts with different background, experiences and cultures.
Musikkompis is an initiative by 3 and Kompisbyrån

Let’s share your music experiences with new friends. Together, we can create many moments of togetherness regardless of where we come from. In the end, this contributes to greater tolerance and understanding in the society. This is why we start the project Musikkompis - a voluntary collaboration between 3 and Kompisbyrån, we wish to strengthen the integration and the feeling of togetherness in the society through music. We want to give more people the opportunity to share their music interests together with new friends: artists, underground bands, DJs, classical musicians and music fans. Sign up as a Musikkompis.
Here you can see some music friends and their music meetings

Naim Kassis, a 45-year-old pianist from Aleppo in Syria, came to Sweden a year ago and ended up in an asylum accommodation in northern Sweden, where he has given numerous concerts. On a cold winter day, he met Sabina Ddumba, and together they played a version of Sabina's hit single "Not too young", which attracted the whole accommodation to take part in the meeting.

Filipe Minhava is a 19-year-old guitarist from Portugal who has lived in Sweden for three months at a friends place in Högdalen. Filipe and Little Jinder met in Stockholm and got to know each other during a day where they visited a flea market, checked on LPs and ate at a restaurant, before they rounded off with the classic hit ”La Bamba” at a karaoke bar.

Bahar Hasko, a Kurdish English teacher, was born in Kamishlo in Syria. Today, she lives and studies in Sweden. Bahar and Eva Dahlgren met one day and talked about music as a way to communicate and learn languages. At the end of the day, Bahar surprised Eva with a children's orchestra who played Eva's classic "Vem tänder stjärnorna".
• Join Kompisbyrån. Write your e-mail, a password of your choice and push the ”Sign up” button. It is free to register. Please, read more about Kompisbyrån’s terms before you sign up.
If you already have registered, you log in here.
I do not speak Swedish fluently and I am not established in Sweden
I speak Swedish fluently and I am established in Sweden
Tell us about yourself, and if you want to be a Musikkompis, please also write about your music interest
I.e education, work and for how long you've been in Sweden. Musikkompis, please write if you play an instrument and which genre of music you like.

Thank you for signing up at Kompisbyrån! Please, answer some questions about yourself. We believe that it’s the personal meeting that unites people, and want to create the best conditions for a successful meeting. Therefore, we match together new friends, mostly based on common or complementary interests.
You can choose and sign up as a Fika friend (Fikakompis) or Music friend (Musikkompis):
Fikakompis - You will be matched with a person who has similar interests as you. You meet and practice Swedish at a café in Göteborg, Jönköping, Linköping, Malmö, Stockholm, Umeå, Uppsala, Västerås or Örebro.
Musikkompis - You will be matched with a person who also likes music. You meet and exchange music experiences in a public place in Göteborg, Jönköping, Linköping, Malmö, Stockholm, Umeå, Uppsala, Västerås or Örebro.

On this page, you can find your previous Fika or Music friends and you can meet new friends by doing a friend request.
You meet your new friend one time. If you like each other, you can meet again by yourself. If you want to meet new friends, you select the city you can meet up in and then press the button "Fika friend request".
If you want to change your application, you can update the form in the menu above: press "Min profil" (My profile) and then "Inställningar" (Settings).
You are waiting for a new Fika or Music friend
You are waiting for a new Fika or Music friend
I want to meet a new Fika or Music friend

Kompisbyrån creates contact between people who are new in Sweden and people who have lived in Sweden for a long time. We want to give you the possibility to meet several new persons with another background than yours, in order for you to broaden your social network.

• Kompisbyrån creates contact between new friends based on similar interests.
  • You must be able to meet your new Fika or Music friend in one of these cities: Göteborg, Jönköping, Linköping, Malmö, Stockholm, Umeå, Uppsala, Västerås or Örebro.
  • Kompisbyrån is only responsible for linking together people who have lived in Sweden for a short time with people who have lived in Sweden for a long time.
  • A meeting with the same person happens one time. Of course, you can together decide if you want to meet again. If you want to meet a new person, you log in with your email and password and make a new request.
  • Everyone over 18 years (of age) can participate.
  • You only have to pay for your own "fika" (for example, a cup of coffee), the registration is for free.
  • Kompisbyrån recommends that you meet your new friend for about 1 hour at a public place in the central part of the city.
  • When you have registered your application, you warrant that your information is correct and agree that the information: may be treated according to PUL and is saved in Kompisbyrån's register so that we can find new friends for you, that your information and e-mail is sent to your new friend, and that we will invite you to Kompisbyrån's activities or offerings. If you want to adjust your submitted information that is registered, please log in with your e-mail and password and update your profile. Controller of personal data is Kompisbyrån’s Board.
  • Our ambition is to find a new friend for you within 30 days, but it may take both shorter and longer time depending on your profile and the number of people who also want to meet new friends. That means that you may have to wait.
  • We confirm that we have received your application, by sending an e-mail to you.
  • You should send an e-mail to your new friend and decide when and where to meet within 7 days.
  • You need to treat each other in a respectful manner. Remember to be clear in you communication with each other as language differences can create misunderstandings.
  • If you want to delete your account, please send an e-mail to kontakt@kompisbyran.se.
  • Kompisbyrån cannot guarantee that we will find a new friend for you, but we will always do our best.
  • We wish to constantly improve our work. Therefore, we will contact you after your meeting to follow up.
Thank you for accepting Kompisbyrån's terms!

Thank you for making a Fika friend request through Kompisbyrån!

This is how it works: 1. Match. We will send you an email (often within 1-30 days) when we have found new Fika friend for you who has similar interests as you. (If you need to complete your application, we will let you know) 2. Decide a date. You send an email to the person within 7 days, and decide date, time and place. Write in Swedish or English (some find Google Translate as a good tool). It is the responsibility of both that you establish contact. Remember to respect each other, not responding an email will affect the other person who has been looking forward to a meeting. Contact us if you don’t get answer. 3. Meeting. You meet at a café or other public place for about 1 hour. Try not to have high expectations but take it as it comes. Be in time! The boring meetings is when someone doesn’t show up, so please exchange telephone numbers and send a text message reminder the day before your meeting, that the other person confirm. If you have any questions, please send us an e-mail :)

Best regards,
Kompisbyrån

This is how it works:

2. Decide a date. You send an email to the person within 7 days, and decide date, time and place. Write in Swedish or English (some find Google Translate as a good tool). It is the responsibility of both that you establish contact. Remember to respect each other, not responding an email will affect the other person who has been looking forward to a meeting. Contact us if you don’t get answer.
3. Meeting. You meet at a café or other public place for about 1 hour. Try not to have high expectations but take it as it comes. Be in time! The boring meetings is when someone doesn’t show up, so please exchange telephone numbers and send a text message reminder the day before your meeting, that the other person confirm.
If you have any questions, please send us an e-mail :)
Best regards, Kompisbyrån

Thank you for making a Music friend request through Kompisbyrån!
This is how it works:
1. Match. We will send you an email (often within 1-30 days) when we have found a new Music friend who has similar interests as you. (If you need to complete your application, we will let you know)
2. Decide a date. You send an email to the person within 7 days, and decide date, time and place. Write in Swedish or English (some find Google Translate as a good tool). (This message will follow in English)
Hej %user_name%!
Nu har vi hittat en %match_music_friend% till dig. %match_gender% heter %match_name% och ni båda gillar %match_categories%. %match_name% är %match_age% år gammal, bor i %match_area% och kommer från %match_from%. %match_gender% träffas gärna i %match_city%.
Din %match_music_friend% email är: %match_email% Vi har också skickat din email till din %match_music_friend%.
Gör så här:
1. Bestäm ett datum. Du mailar personen inom 7 dagar och bestämmer datum, tid och plats. Skriv gärna på svenska och engelska. Det är bådas ansvar att ni etablerar kontakt med varandra. Kom ihåg att respektera varandra, att inte svara på ett mail påverkar den andra personen som har sett fram emot ett möte. Kontakta oss om du inte får svar.
Vi rekommenderar att ni byter telefonnummer och skickar en sms-påminnelse dagen innan er fika som den andra personen bekräftar.
2. Ni träffas! Ni träffas på ett kafé eller annat offentligt ställe i cirka 1 timme. Försök att inte ha höga förväntningar utan ta det som det kommer. Kom i tid! De tråkiga träffarna är när någon inte dyker upp på utsatt tid.
3. Om ni vill, ta gärna ett foto från ert möte och skriva några rader om vad ni gjorde och hur det var (med bådas samtycke). Maila hälsningen till oss så delar vi den gärna digitalt för att inspirera fler till att vara med. Eller hashtagga själv med #kompisbyrån eller #kompisbyran.
Du är alltid välkommen att höra av dig till oss om något inte blev som du tänkt dig.
Vi önskar er ett trevligt möte!
Bästa hälsningar Vännerna på Kompisbyrån
--------- English version ---------
Hello %user_name%!
We have now found a good match for you. The person you will meet is %match_name% and both of you like %match_categories%. %match_name% is %match_age% years old, lives in %match_area% and is from %match_from%. %match_name% would like to meet you in %match_city%.
The email adress to %match_name% is: %match_email%. We have also sent your email adress to %match_name%.
Please follow the steps below:
1. Decide a date. You send an email to %match_name% within 7 days, and decide date, time and place. Write in Swedish or English (some find Google Translate as a good tool). It is the responsibility of both that you establish contact. Remember to respect each other, not responding an email will affect the other person who has been looking forward to a meeting. Contact us if you don’t get answer.
We recommend that you exchange telephone numbers and send a text message as a reminder the day before your meeting, that the other person confirm.
2. Meeting. You meet at a café or other public place for about 1 hour. Try not to have high expectations but take it as it comes. Be in time! The boring meetings is when someone doesn’t show up on time.
3. The stories from your meetings are always so inspiring. If you want, take a photo during your meeting and tell us more about what you did and how it was (with approval from both of you). If you send it to us, and we will share it digitally. Or feel free to hashtag #kompisbyrån or #kompisbyran
You are always welcome to contact us if anything was not what you expected.
We wish you a nice meeting!
Best regards, Your friends at Kompisbyrån
